snippet: Mayday PAC, started this spring as the “super PAC to end all super PACs,” wasn’t the biggest group of its kind to have a disappointing Election Day, but it might be the one that gets the most attention for its failures.
abstract: Mayday PAC, started this spring as the “super PAC to end all super PACs,” wasn’t the biggest group of its kind to have a disappointing Election Day, but it might be the one that gets the most attention for its failures.

headline.main: Founder of Anti-Money 'Super PAC' Defends Its Poor Showing
